macro_markets.query: What are the most important macroeconomic and stock market news and developments from the past 24 hours? Include major index movements, Fed/central bank news, and significant company earnings or announcements.

items.title: US Major Indices Show Minor Declines; S&P500 at 6940, Nasdaq at 23515, DJIA at 49359
items.summary: US stock markets closed Friday with slight losses: S&P500 down 0.06%, Nasdaq Composite down 0.06%, and DJIA down 0.17%, while VIX edged up 0.13%. Leadership broadening in S&P500 and global stocks, with SMidCaps outperforming LargeCaps and high earnings breadth at 82%.

items.title: Fed Speculation: Trump Reluctant on Hassett as Chair; Yields Hit 4.23% High
items.summary: Trump signals reluctance to nominate Kevin Hassett as Fed Chair, boosting USD briefly; 10-year Treasury yield reaches 4.23%, highest since September, amid Kevin Warsh as frontrunner. Fed's Bowman calls for rate cut prep due to fragile labor market, contrasting hawkish views.

items.title: Bank Earnings Mixed: Goldman Sachs Surges 4.6% on Record Trading Revenue
items.summary: Goldman Sachs shares rose 4.6% on record equity trading revenue, highest among Wall Street banks, while JPMorgan Chase fell 4.2% due to weak investment banking fees despite meeting expectations. Major banks show robust results overall with trading strength.

items.title: US Industrial Production Beats Expectations at +0.4% in December
items.summary: US industrial production rose 0.4% month-over-month in December, exceeding forecasts, with capacity utilization improving to 76.3%. This Goldilocks data supports persistent economic strength amid market movements.

items.title: Geopolitical Tensions: Trump Threatens 25% Tariffs on EU Over Greenland
items.summary: Trump threatens up to 25% tariffs on European allies unless US can buy Greenland from Denmark, prompting EU warnings of a 'dangerous downward spiral'. Rising EU-US tensions could drive USD index toward 100 resistance.

items.title: Japan Snap Election and Currency Warnings Pressure USD/JPY
items.summary: Japan's Finance Minister warns of currency intervention as USD/JPY slips 0.3% toward 156.3 support amid snap election concerns. Announcement of snap election drove last week's market moves.

items.title: Alibaba Health Surges 17.9% on AI Health Assistant Milestone
items.summary: Alibaba Health jumped 17.9% as AI health assistant 'Ant Afu' hits over 30 million monthly users, validating AI demand in healthcare. Parent Alibaba gained 13.5% after AI upgrades; Hang Seng up 2.3% last week.

crypto_news.query: What are the most significant cryptocurrency and blockchain news from the past 24 hours? Include major price movements, regulatory news, and notable project developments.

items.title: Bitcoin Plunges Nearly $4,000 in Rapid Sell-Off Amid Tariff Tensions
items.summary: Bitcoin dropped from $95,500 to $91,900 in under two hours on January 19, triggered by U.S. President Trump's tariff threats on Europe and Greenland, wiping out over $500 million in leveraged positions. The crypto market cap fell nearly 3% to $3.12 trillion, with $240,000 liquidated amid reduced rate cut expectations and U.S. market closure for MLK Day.

items.title: Crypto Market Downturn: BTC Slides 3.36% Below $92,000 as Gold Surges
items.summary: Bitcoin traded at $91,950 after a 3.36% 24-hour decline, influenced by EU retaliation tariffs worth 93 billion euros against U.S. exports and Nasdaq futures dropping 1%. Spot gold and silver hit record highs amid the volatility.

items.title: U.S. Strategic Bitcoin Reserve Push Continues Despite Market Plunge
items.summary: White House Crypto Committee director Patrick Witt stated on January 18 that efforts for a U.S. Strategic Bitcoin Reserve remain active, potentially supporting BTC in the medium to long term amid short-term pressure toward $90,000.

ai_news.query: What are the most important artificial intelligence and machine learning news and developments from the past 24 hours? Include new model releases, company announcements, research breakthroughs, and industry trends.

items.title: Keysight Releases Machine Learning Toolkit for Faster Semiconductor Device Modeling
items.summary: Keysight Technologies launched a new Machine Learning Toolkit in its Device Modeling Software Suite, reducing model development time from weeks to hours for faster PDK delivery and DTCO applications in advanced semiconductor architectures like GAA transistors and chiplets.[1]

items.title: Aibrary Launches World's First AI Learning Companion with Nova and Idea Twin
items.summary: Aibrary announced a major platform update featuring Nova, an AI agent with long-term memory and context awareness, plus Idea Twin for interactive learning from millions of books, aimed at personalized growth and habit formation.[5]

items.title: Debate Intensifies: Does AI Like GPT-5 Generate Truly New Ideas or Remix Existing Ones?
items.summary: OpenAI's GPT-5 demonstrated progress on math problems like Erdos challenges but was found to rediscover existing solutions; experts praise its research capabilities via reinforcement learning while questioning novel idea generation.[2]

items.title: AI-Powered EdTech Launches New Digital Learning Platform for Regional Schools
items.summary: An AI-powered EdTech company announced the launch of a new digital learning platform, with modules successfully piloted in Guyana, targeting schools in the region.[8]

gaming.query: What are the most notable video game and gaming industry news from the past 24 hours? Include game releases, announcements, esports, and industry developments.

items.title: Paramount Developing Sonic the Hedgehog Movie Spin-Offs
items.summary: Paramount is reportedly developing multiple Sonic the Hedgehog movie spin-offs. This news emerged in recent Sonic fan discussions.

items.title: Sonic the Hedgehog 4 Release Date Set for March 19, 2027
items.summary: The upcoming Sonic the Hedgehog 4 film has been scheduled for theatrical release on March 19, 2027. Details shared in Variety and fan communities.

items.title: Sonic the Hedgehog #84 Comic Releases January 21, 2026
items.summary: The next issue of Sonic the Hedgehog comics, #84, is set to release on January 21, 2026, alongside other titles like Sonic Racing CrossWorlds on March 4.

items.title: JOJO Magazine 2026 Spring Announced with March 23 Release
items.summary: JOJO magazine 2026 SPRING has been announced, featuring a new JoJo's Bizarre Adventure spin-off gag one-shot by Mitsutoshi Shimabukuro, releasing March 23, 2026.

items.title: Final Fantasy XIV Patch 7.4 Now Live with Ongoing Events
items.summary: Final Fantasy XIV's Patch 7.4 is active, including new resources, meetups, and discussions on raid clears and job balance in player communities.

tech_news.query: What are the most important technology news and developments from the past 24 hours? Include major product launches, company news, and significant tech industry developments. Exclude AI-specific news.

items.title: India Post Delivers First Online Order via ONDC Platform
items.summary: The Department of Posts successfully delivered its first-ever online order through the Open Network for Digital Commerce (ONDC), marking its entry as a Logistics Service Provider on the platform.

items.title: RES Australia JV Submits 450MW Solar-Plus-Storage Project to EPBC Act
items.summary: RES Australia joint venture has submitted a 450MW solar-plus-storage site for approval under the Environment Protection and Biodiversity Conservation Act.

items.title: Galgotias University Opens IIT Mandi Catalyst Satellite Centre
items.summary: Galgotias University inaugurated the IIT Mandi Catalyst Satellite Centre at its Greater Noida campus to foster innovation and technology development.

items.title: Tech Mahindra Stock Surges with 5.58% Weekly Return and High Trading Volume
items.summary: Tech Mahindra achieved a 5.58% return over the last week, with trading volume reaching 3,733,401 shares, far exceeding the seven-day average.
